__TOC__



Team meetings are organized for members to discuss plans, ideas, goals, projects, funding, concerns, etc. regarding the Ubuntu community. Meetings take place in #ubuntu-us on <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/InternetRelayChat|FreeNode]]</nowiki>. The US Teams meetings are open to the public. We welcome any and all visitors.
